abstract: 23andMe, an online company backed by funds from Google that is selling a personal DNA test for $999, has made its start as a kind of genetics-focused MySpace or Facebook, but with the more serious aim of allowing medicine someday to target Americans’ ills more precisely.
lead_paragraph: 23andMe, an online company backed by funds from Google that is selling a personal DNA test for $999, has made its start as a kind of genetics-focused MySpace or Facebook, but with the more serious aim of allowing medicine someday to target Americans’ ills more precisely.

abstract: Google Checkout and eBay’s PayPal generous promotions today to increase their share of holiday spending. But when they don’t buy friends, merchants say neither has much appeal at major online stores.
snippet: Google Checkout and eBay’s PayPal generous promotions today to increase their share of holiday spending. But when they don’t buy friends, merchants say neither has much appeal at major online stores.
lead_paragraph: Behind the pitched Cyber Monday battle of online retailers is the battle of the payment systems. Both Google Checkout and eBay’s PayPal unveiled generous promotions today to increase their share of holiday spending.

headline.main: Google Checkout and PayPal Spend Big to Lure Buyers
